java/liquibase/database/sql/DropSequenceStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.PostgresDatabase;
00005 import liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException;
00006 
00007 public class DropSequenceStatement implements SqlStatement {
00008 
00009     private String schemaName;
00010     private String sequenceName;
00011 
00012     public DropSequenceStatement(String schemaName, String sequenceName) {
00013         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00014         this.sequenceName = sequenceName;
00015     }
00016 
00017     public String getSchemaName() {
00018         return schemaName;
00019     }
00020 
00021     public String getSequenceName() {
00022         return sequenceName;
00023     }
00024 
00025     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) throws StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException {
00026         if (!supportsDatabase(database)) {
00027             throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException(this, database);
00028         }
00029 
00030         String sql = "DROP SEQUENCE " + database.escapeSequenceName(getSchemaName(), getSequenceName());
00031         if (database instanceof PostgresDatabase) {
00032             sql += " CASCADE";
00033         }
00034 
00035         return sql;
00036     }
00037 
00038     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00039         return ";";
00040     }
00041 
00042     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00043         return database.supportsSequences();
00044     }
00045 }
